com.linkedin.cubert.functions.builtin

Class BooleanFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.cubert.functions.Function
      • com.linkedin.cubert.functions.builtin.BooleanFunction

  • public class BooleanFunction
extends Function
    A suite of builtin boolean functions.

    If any of the input is null, then output will also be null (except IS NULL, IS NOT NULL and IN).
